resources.string: Vehicle Counter is an application that allows you to count the number of vehicles passing by a certain point on a road. You can use it to monitor traffic flow, analyze traffic patterns, or conduct surveys. You can choose from different types of vehicles, such as cars, trucks, buses, motorcycles, and bicycles. You can also save and share the data to email for further analysis. To delete saved data you can click trash can icon at the top right corner of the my data screen or you can delete the data one by one by swiping it to the left. \nVehicle Counter is a useful and easy-to-use tool for anyone interested in traffic management or research.
This process will delete your data! Are you sure want to continue?
